extension.description: With this script you are able to manage your cdARTs. You can download cdARTs from fanart.tv, Backup your cdARTs, View and even delete your local cdARTs

A programmal kÃ¶nnyen kezelheted a CD lemez kÃ©peidet (CDArts). LetÃ¶ltheted vele Å‘ket az fanart.tv-rÃ³l, biztonsÃ¡gi mÃ¡solatot kÃ©szÃ­thetsz rÃ³luk, megnÃ©zheted Ã©s mÃ©g tÃ¶rÃ¶lheted is a gÃ©peden lÃ©vÅ‘ lemezkÃ©peket.

Met dit script kun je je cdARTs beheren. Je kunt cdARTs downloaden van fanart.tv, een backup maken, cdARTs bekijken en je eigen cdARTS verwijderen.

Este script permite que vocÃª gerencie seus cdARTs. VocÃª poderÃ¡ baixar cdARTs do site fanart.tv, efetuar backup, Visualizar e atÃ© apagar seus cdARTs armazenados localmente.

MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.

extension.description:
This addon will automatically set artwork for all movie sets in your library.
The addon can search for common parent folders of movies within a set or you can specify a single artwork folder containing artwork for all your movie sets (eg <set name>-poster.jpg).

Script qui retourne, soit de maniÃ¨re alÃ©atoire, soit les derniers ajouts, les films, Ã©pisodes, albums ou clips de la base de donnÃ©es. Il peut optionnellement gerer les playlistes pour filtrer les resultats.

addon.name: Rating Update
addon.extension: ﻿ all ﻿ http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=107331 ﻿ Keep up to date the ratings and the Top250 of your all Movies and TVShows. ﻿ Tieni aggiornate le valutazioni e la Top250 di tutti i tuoi Film e Serie TV. ﻿ Would you like to update the ratings and the Top250 of all your Movies and TVShows without rescrape all data? This script allow you to update the ratings of all your Movies and TVShows in one shot and keep updated the IMDb Top250. To avoid mistakes will be used the IMDb ID and the database will be updated only if necessary. Will be processed the scores, the number of users who have voted, the MPAA and the Top250 of course. ﻿ Desideri aggiornare le valutazioni e la Top250 di tutti i tuoi Film e Serie TV senza fare il rescrape tutti i dati? Questo script consente di aggiornare le valutazioni di tutti i tuoi Film e Serie TV in un solo colpo e mantiene aggiornata la Top250 di IMDb. Per evitare errori verrÃ utilizzato l'ID di IMDb e il database verrÃ aggiornato solo se necessario. Saranno aggiornati i punteggi, il numero di utenti che hanno votato, la valutazione MPAA e la Top250, naturalmente. ﻿ Works only if you have the IMDb IDs in your database. ﻿ Funziona solo se gli ID IMDb sono presenti nel database.

addon.name: Aeon XBMCMania
addon.extension: Aeon Nox 4.2 Helix by Big_Noid & phil65 with mods of XBMCMania Aeon Nox 4.2 Helix por Big_Noid & phil65 con mods de XBMCMania Aeon Nox is an artwork-intense Kodi skin with an endless amount of customization possibilites. There are many different views and options to present your media in the way you want it. The home window is fully customizable, you can re-order main menu items, assign submenus and widgets to them or change the overall look with different styles and themes. A skin which perfectly adapts to your needs.It is based on the design of Aeon by djh_. A great deal of textures used are from Aeon and its mods. All credits to the creators of these skins and mods. Also this version has all the mods XBMCMania to know more visit our website http://www.xbmcmania.com/index.php?topic=211.0 Aeon Nox es sinonimo de espectaculo visual y personalizacion. Hay muchos puntos de vista diferentes y las opciones para presentar sus medios en la forma que desee. La ventana principal es completamente personalizable. Usted puede agregar hasta nueve elementos de menu principal, cada uno con cinco submenu personalizado. Puede cambiar el aspecto con diferentes estilos y temas, agregar o quitar widgets y deshabilitar elementos del menÃº y submenÃº que no se usen. AsegÃºrese de repasar el registro de cambios 'changelog' para encontrar todo lo que se ha aÃ±adido y cambiado! Ademas esta version cuenta con todos los mods de XBMCMania para saber mas visita nuestra web www.xbmcmania.com ﻿ Only compatible with Kodi 14.0 Helix. Not recommended for low-end platforms (Raspberry PI, AppleTV, Android devices) Aeon Nox es una piel basada en el diseÃ±o de Aeon por djh_. Una gran cantidad de texturas utilizadas son de Aeon y ese mods. Todos los crÃ©ditos a los productores de estas pieles y mods. all https://repository-xbmcmania.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/skin.aeon.nox.xbmcmania http://www.xbmcmania.com/index.php?topic=211.0 www.xbmcmania.com

extension.summary: Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (Kodi's default skin)
Confluence skin por Jezz_X. (skin por defecto)
extension.description: Confluence is the default skin for Kodi 14.0 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.

Confluence es la skin por defecto de Kodi 9.11 y posteriores. Es una combinaciÃ³n de conceptos de muchas skins populares, e intenta abarcar e integrar lo mejor de ellas en una skin que sea sencilla de entender y utilizar para los nuevos usuarios de Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Confluence is the default skin for Kodi, removing it may cause issues
Confluence es la skin por defecto de Kodi. Borrarla puede causar problemas
